Things to do

British Columbia’s provincial parks offer experiences as memorable and diverse as the province’s extraordinary natural landscape. Explore sandy beaches and majestic forests, hike new trails, or paddle down peaceful rivers. An adventure awaits every visitor. 

At BC Parks, we manage campsites, day-use areas, and thousands of kilometres of trails. Together, these provide a vast range of fun, convenient, and low-cost ways to explore B.C. Use the links below to learn about the many activities you can enjoy at provincial parks across this province.
